meanings.definition: The state of being in excessive debt.
meanings.sent1: Her overindebtednesses caused her a lot of stress.
meanings.sent2: Many families struggle with overindebtednesses due to high medical bills.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's overindebtednesses led to comical situations in the show.
meanings.sent4: The weight of his overindebtednesses felt like a heavy burden on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The image of the overflowing piggy bank symbolized the concept of overindebtednesses.

meanings.definition: The condition of owing more money than one can afford to repay.
meanings.sent1: Bankruptcy may be the only solution for severe overindebtednesses.
meanings.sent2: Financial education can help individuals avoid falling into overindebtednesses.
meanings.sent3: The comedy movie portrayed a character trying to hide his overindebtednesses from his family.
meanings.sent4: Her overindebtednesses were like a maze with no way out.
meanings.sent5: The warning signs of overindebtednesses were clear, but he ignored them until it was too late.
